TITLE: Reading Skills
DEF: Effectively comprehending and interpreting written information
TASK: The Reading Skills pattern works to facilitate learners' ability to comprehend and interpret written information effectively. Concentrating on strategies that enhance understanding, speed, and retention, such as active reading, annotation, and summarization, this pattern proves particularly useful. However, one size doesn't fit all when it comes to reading techniques, and the pattern needs to adapt to learners' unique needs, preferences, and pace for maximum effectiveness.
